#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<malloc.h>
const char * make_a_copy(const char *st)
{
char *copy_st;
copy_st=malloc(strlen(st));
strcpy(copy_st,st);
return copy_st;
}
int main()
{
const char *str1="A";
const char *str2=make_a_copy(str1);
printf("%s\n",str2);
return 0;
}

/*Expected Output : A

Rules:

1)    Changes can only be made in main() function
2)    U can delete at most four characters in given program and can add at most 4 characters.
*/
